issue.title: [Release][CI] Add tests using Clang 12, Mac OS 11, Mac OS 12
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15531](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15531). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Clang 12 was released in 2021 and is used in Mac OS 12 which is available as an image for GitHub actions:
https://github.com/actions/virtual-environments/tree/main/images.CI/macos/azure-pipelines

Add Mac OS12 and Mac OS 11 to the CI workflows in:
https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/.github/workflows/cpp.yml
